de.must.dataobj
Class ConnectionHolder

java.lang.Object
  de.must.dataobj.ConnectionHolder

public class ConnectionHolder
extends java.lang.Object

Connection Holder. Handle to one database connection with functions to separate SQL dialects. The connection holder is a connection plus its information how it is created. Thus, the connection may be rebuild if refused.

See Also:
ConnectionPool

lock

public void lock()
Locks the connection as privately use. Causes isVacant to return false.

unlock

public void unlock()
Unlocks the connection as privately use. Causes isVacant to return true.
